column5: I see yer logged in there bud.  Saying hello  Is there a new truck and boat wrap coming for 2007?

Hi Dude,  Next years wrap should look good. It will be a Bass Pro / Toyota wrap again. I have better things on my mind right now. I'm in the middle of packing for a Peacock Bass trip and tournament in Brazil tommorow.  I will be trying to send back reports on my blog at www.factsoffishing.com if you are interested YEEEEEEEEEEEHAAAAAAAAAA Bring on the Amazon!!!!   Regards, Dave Mercer www.factsoffishing.com

A big guy like you fighting peacocks I would of thought maybe you be down giVen them Tarpon tourneys a try.Man thats one exciting and extream tourney.  Good to hear from ya.  Have yerself a great winter.Probly see ya at the spring show first at BPS.
You got me all excited there for a minute! I thought I was Rick Mercer who was on-line! He was fishing with Mr. Rae on a recent episode of his show...
IS THIS THE SAME DAVE MERCER THAT DOES THE SHORT SEGMENTS FACTS OF FISHING ON THE WEATHER CHANNEL?
cacth em up! I hope to get my first Pea in a month or so in South Florida...
Stop yelling.   And yes, it's the same guy.
Dave....are we supposed to be impressed????   ...trip of a life time ...catch em up . Can't wait for the show ...
Stop yelling.  And yes, it's the same guy.  ;)
Dave Thanx for the birthday card   and enjoy the trip

JEEZ!!! I'm green with envy. Those Peacock Bass need an X-tra heavy duty Muskie rod to get them in along with a big dang' winch of a reel. I've heard some stories about them. I look forward to reading your blog to hear the stories.
DAVE MERCERS OVERRATED......   ... lol.. yes... thats the jealousy talking.....  http://www.factsoffishing.com/blog.php  uhhg....   lol.. have fun Dave...  Yup.. its official... IM jealous...
Your jealous of him Hell, Im jealous of you for crips sakes.
Its cause Im so good looking ... isn't it....
TJ, is it hard work being a stud muffin.
